mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finance VALUES( FINANCE_SEQ.nextval, #{budget_num}, #{staff_num}, TO_DATE(#{finance_eDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{finance_cls}, #{finance_iE}, #{finance_amount}, #{finance_eYear})
mapper.select: SELECT f.finance_num, b.budget_cls, s.staff_name, TO_CHAR(f.finance_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "finance_edate", f.finance_cls, f.finance_ie, f.finance_amount, f.budget_num, f.staff_num, f.finance_eYear FROM finance f, budget b, staff s WHERE f.budget_num = b.budget_num AND f.staff_num = s.staff_num AND finance_num = #{finance_num}
